channel.title: Comments on: Proofs in Geometry – The Modification Continues…
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Celeste Sinclair
item.dc:creator: Celeste Sinclair
item.description: Interesting idea. I like the scaffolding of this approach. I'm teaching proofs for the first time next semester, so I need all the help I can get! Thanks for posting.
item.content:encoded: Interesting idea. I like the scaffolding of this approach. I’m teaching proofs for the first time next semester, so I need all the help I can get! Thanks for posting.
